methodology: Phase 3 LEGO + Pattern Extraction v5.0.1 - COMPLETE TILING
note: Every seed shows ALL LEGOs (new + referenced) needed to reconstruct it.
extraction_notes: Example extraction demonstrating Phase 3 v5.0.1 methodology with molecular LEGOs and complete tiling

seed_pair: Me gustaría poder hablar después de que termines.
I'd like to be able to speak after you finish.

metadata.molecular_rationale: Multi-word unit expressing conditional desire. Cannot be broken down further while maintaining FD mapping.
metadata.notes: Conditional form of 'gustar' combined with indirect object pronoun. Common in polite requests.
Modal verb expressing ability/possibility. Frequently used with infinitives.

metadata.fd_test: KNOWN: 'after you finish' → TARGET: 'después de que termines' (deterministic)
metadata.molecular_rationale: CRITICAL: 'después de que' alone fails FD test (grammatically incomplete, requires verb clause). Must include conjugated verb to form complete FD unit.
metadata.structure_explanation: Temporal conjunction 'después de que' + subjunctive verb. The subjunctive is required after this conjunction when referring to future/uncertain actions.
metadata.notes: This demonstrates the molecular LEGO principle: the entire phrase is indivisible for FD purposes.

P04.description: Expressing conditional desires or polite requests
P04.grammatical_notes: Uses conditional form of gustar (to please) with indirect object pronoun
examples: Me gustaría poder (I'd like to be able to)
Me gustaría hablar (I'd like to speak)
Me gustaría saber (I'd like to know)
P04.teaching_notes: Emphasize the conditional aspect and polite register

P10.description: Expressing temporal relationships with future/uncertain actions
P10.grammatical_notes: Temporal conjunction requiring subjunctive mood when action is future or uncertain
examples: después de que termines (after you finish)
después de que llegues (after you arrive)
después de que comas (after you eat)
P10.teaching_notes: Key subjunctive trigger. Emphasize that 'después de que' alone is grammatically incomplete.

learnings: Complete Tiling: S0011 shows ALL LEGOs including 'hablar' (ref: S0001)
Molecular LEGO principle: 'después de que' cannot stand alone grammatically
FD test prevents incomplete constructions from being isolated as LEGOs
All molecular LEGOs must include componentization showing internal structure
Pattern instances marked at LEGO level, summarized at course level
New/ref markers enable validation and basket generation

v5_0_0_structure.tracking: no new/ref markers, no cumulative counts
v5_0_0_structure.note: Seeds could NOT be reconstructed - missing referenced LEGOs

v5_0_1_improvements.lego_format: object {id, type, target, known, new/ref, components?}
v5_0_1_improvements.note: Seeds are perfectly reconstructible by concatenating LEGO targets

why_it_matters.basket_generation: Needs to see complete LEGO composition to generate valid practice phrases
why_it_matters.pattern_analysis: Requires knowing which LEGOs tile together to identify patterns
why_it_matters.validation: Must prove every seed reconstructs perfectly from its LEGOs
why_it_matters.agent_context: Agents need complete context to understand seed structure

complete_tiling_demonstration.s0011_reconstruction: Me gustaría + poder + hablar + después de que termines
complete_tiling_demonstration.validation: ✓ All words accounted for, seed perfectly reconstructible
